doc:
Jack Oakie https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jack_Oakie 0 Jack Oakie (born Lewis Delaney Offield, November 12, 1903 – January 23, 1978) was an American actor, starring mostly in films, but also working on stage, radio and television. He portrayed Napaloni in Chaplin's The Great Dictator (1940), receiving a nomination for the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor. Jack_Oakie ( born Lewis_Delaney_Offield , November_12_,_1903 – January_23_,_1978 ) was an_American_actor , starring mostly in films , but also working on stage_,_radio_and_television . He portrayed Napaloni in Chaplin 's_The_Great_Dictator_(_1940_) , receiving a_nomination for the_Academy_Award for Best_Supporting_Actor .
